tool_description: Schedules and coordinates regulatory and sponsor site inspections based on inspection requirements and site availability.

site_ids.description: List of clinical site identifiers for inspection scheduling

inspection_type.description: Type of inspection (regulatory, sponsor_audit, pre_approval, routine)

inspection_duration_days.description: Expected duration of inspection in days (1-5)

error_messages: Invalid site IDs: One or more site identifiers are not recognized
Invalid inspection type: Use regulatory, sponsor_audit, pre_approval, or routine
Invalid timeframe: End date must be after start date with sufficient scheduling window
Invalid duration: Inspection duration must be between 1 and 5 days
Invalid priority level: Use high, medium, or low
Scheduling conflict: No available time slots found within the specified timeframe
usage: Provide site IDs, inspection type, and preferred timeframe to schedule coordinated inspections with appropriate resources and timing.

scheduled_inspections.description: List of scheduled inspection details with dates and sites

inspector_assignments.description: Assigned inspectors for each scheduled inspection
